author: farhan
title: BEWARE OF THIS RANDOM WOMAN WHO PINCHED MY BABY'S CHEEK TILL SORE @ WESTGATE
text:
BEWARE OF THIS RANDOM WOMAN WHO PINCHED MY BABY'S CHEEK TILL SORE @ WESTGATE   Advertisement 
<Facebook complaint by Cindy W> 
Dear mummies, please beware of this lady. I was shopping at Westgate just now, and helper was carrying my baby. Suddenly I heard my baby scream loudly, and my helper pointed out to me that this woman just pinched him really hard on his cheeks even after she turned away from her. 
I went up to confront her and she denied, till I told her that I'm going to lodge a police report only then she admitted. She said she found him cute thats why she pinched him. 
No police report made as she mentioned she had a father to take care of at home. Why does such people even exist? LO's face is still red till now Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
